lead_paragraph: A report that the N.C.A.A. has merged inquiries into two former University of Southern California athletes for accepting money suggests investigators are shifting focus to the school at large.
snippet: A report that the N.C.A.A. has merged inquiries into two former University of Southern California athletes for accepting money suggests investigators are shifting focus to the school at large.
